skillTree.localised_description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.
Souls retrieved from the Netherwold and bound to their controller provide a degree of magical resistance.
This complex distillation not only preserves the drinker in glorious Unlife, it also increases their physical resistance to attack.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: When intoned, this ritual text holds back decay so the Tomb Kings' souls can be bound to their mortal remains once more.

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(all armies)

skillTree.localised_description: There are specialised rituals, chants and incantations for drawing forth dead spirits and binding them back into their corporeal forms; this one knows them all.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing your way around the Realm of Souls, along with knowledge of the required ritual incantations, are essential skills for the dedicated Liche Priest.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By which the dead don't stay that way for long, springing back into jerking, clanking Unlife.

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.localised_description: Sword-blows are mysteriously turned away as Ptra's wife reaches out to shield Nehekhara's warriors from evil.

skillTree.localised_description: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

skillTree.localised_description: As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A whirlwind of skulls tears across the battlefield, devouring all in its path in the Goddess of the Green Moon's bitter, vindictive name.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"
Overcast spell: "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight or when trying to get away afterwards!
"Revered One, Venerable One, Lord of Secrets, High Priest of the Temple of Years"
The God of the Scorpions protects the venal, the perfidious, and the downright murderous.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

Melee attack: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Benevolent Tahoth imparts sacred knowledge and timeless wisdom to his people.
The Tomb Kings and their servants feel Khsar's wrath coursing through their Unliving veins.
Time itself cannot harm those who have defied death.
There are many perfectly-uttered litanies and precise incantations required to draw forth spirits from the Realm of Souls. This one knows them all.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Liche Priest is so powerful he can tap energy directly from the Realm of Souls and direct it at will.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance
